newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Vornado Realty a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Vornado Realty a buy.

text.p: -- UBS Securities analyst Mary Hogan said in a research note she initiated coverage of Vornado Realty Trust with a buy recommendation and a 12-month price target of $75 per share.

-- Hogan states that key positives for the company are "highly regarded, highly incentivized management team with significant insider ownership" and the company's "shift toward more aggressive growth strategy (that) could result in earnings upside beyond our expectations."
-- 1997 estimated funds from operations are $2.36 per share and for 1998 it is $3.80 per share.
-- The company is a "premier shopping center REIT transitioning into a more agressive, growth-oriented REIT," Hogan said.
-- Shares were up 1/4 to 64-3/8 in early New York Stock Exchange trade.
